clumpy.definition.FeatureLayer¶

class clumpy.definition.FeatureLayer(name=None, time=0, path=None, data=None, copy_metadata=None)[source]¶

Bases: clumpy.definition._layer._Layer

Defines an Explanatory Variable (EV) layer. This layer can then used for the calibration stage or the allocation stage:

elevation = clumpy.definition.layer.LayerEV(name='elevation',time=0,scale=15)
Parameters

  • name (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

  • time (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is 0.

  • path (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

  • data (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

  • copy_metadata (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is None.

Returns

Return type

None.

Methods

export_asc(self, path[, verbose])

Export the layer data as an asc file in order to use it through CLUES and CLUMondo.
export_asc(self, path, verbose=0)¶

Export the layer data as an asc file in order to use it through CLUES and CLUMondo.

Parameters

  • path (str) – path to the file.

  • verbose (int, default=0) – level of verbosity.
